baseRule.text: 若復苾芻尼自壞種子有情村。及令他壞者。波逸底迦。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 11

translations.text: Beschädigung von Pflanzen, muß gesühnt werden.
If a monk destroys plants, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Dañar a una planta viva: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。殺眾草木。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 11

fullParallels.text: 若比丘殺眾草木。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 11

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻自壞種子。有情村及令他壞者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 11

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。自伐鬼村若使人伐。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 11

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。壞種子破鬼村。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 11

translations.text: If a monk destroy the abodes of disembodied spirits, it is Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu merusak sebuah kediaman para hantu dan makhluk halus, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘壞鬼神村者波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 11

fullParallels.text: 若比丘壞種子鬼神村。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Kāśyapīya Bhikkhu Pācittiya 11

translations.text: Beschädigung von Pflanzen, muß gesühnt werden.
The damaging of a living plant is to be confessed.
Merusak sebuah tanaman hidup harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，壞鬼神村者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 11

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼自伐鬼村。若使人言伐是。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 11

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。斫伐鬼村種子村。波夜提(一十)。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 10

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。壞種子破鬼村波夜提。
